City Council
============

The Los Fresnos City Council is comprised of six members made up of the Mayor and five City Council members.

![Alejandro Flores Mayor](https://cityoflosfresnos.com/sites/default/files/styles/directory_listings_-_body__4-column/public/imageattachments/directory/2278/alejandro-flores-mayor-1-200x300.jpg?itok=otWadyzt)

[Alejandro Flores](https://cityoflosfresnos.com/directory-listing/alejandro-flores)
